knimeNode.name: ProteinCalculateFDR
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the FDR with the given parameters. The first parameter is the decoy strategy, either accessionpattern or inherit (cautious with this). The second is the decoy regular expression.

intro.p: Calculates the FDR with the given parameters. The first parameter is the decoy strategy, either accessionpattern or inherit (cautious with this). The second is the decoy regular expression.

fullDescription.option: Additional Java settings, like giving Java a big enough amount of memory.
Use accessionpattern to use a regular expression to identify decoys. inherit is not recommended

ports.inPort: Path to the file, which contains the build pipeline until this step. [xml]
ports.outPort: Path to the file, which will contain the pipeline with added filters. [xml]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of ProteinCalculateFDR.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of ProteinCalculateFDR. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
